description: This file defines the FixedSizeChunking class, a strategy for splitting documents into fixed-size chunks with optional overlap, used in text processing within a document management system.

classes.name: FixedSizeChunking
classes.description: A chunking strategy that splits text into fixed-size segments with optional overlap, inheriting from ChunkingStrategy.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the FixedSizeChunking with specified chunk size and overlap, validating parameters.

methods.name: chunk
methods.description: Splits a Document into fixed-size chunks, ensuring words are not split in half and applying overlap if specified.
